thread.title: AMS

author: AMS
title: AMS
text: I ordered a dwarf bonanza peach tree and a goji berry bush for my sunny balcony in Colorado. Both came on time and in good condition. The box was a little smushed, which tore a tiny branch but I attribute that to the shipping folks, not the orchard. The tree was well wrapped and prepped for travel. It's only been here two weeks and it immediately took to being planted in a pot and is enjoying our chilly spring weather! Would buy from here again!
